translations: [植保] 溃疡病；口疮；腐败的原由，弊害

sentences.sentence: His dog has a canker in its ear.
sentences.translation: 他的狗的耳朵上有一处溃疡。

sentences.sentence: Cold sores usually appear on the lip; canker sores affect the inside of the mouth.
sentences.translation: 溃疡往往发生在嘴唇上，主要影响口腔内部。

sentences.sentence: A saltwater gargle will take the bite out of a toothache and ease the pain of canker sores and sore throats.
sentences.translation: 盐水漱口将减轻牙痛、口腔溃疡和咽痛。
